external.description: PowerShell functions for turning plain-English into ---> PS code, powered by 3 popular AI models.  LLM generated outputs are narrowed to be blocks in-console & copied to clipboard. - J-DubAp...
external.title: GitHub - J-DubApps/get-chat-cmd: PowerShell functions for turning plain-English into ---> PS code, powered by 3 popular AI models.  LLM generated outputs are narrowed to be blocks in-console & copied ...

record.text: In honor of @powershellsummit.org  (couldn't go this year) I finished making a thing.  Just some quick functions that use 3 popular AI providers to turn basic directives into PS code to evaluate (doesn't run any code, just puts it in console and clipboard).   Also supports local-hosted users.
